item.description:
SAVE THE DATE: May 7, 2010

American Society of Picture Professionals New England Chapter
Powderhouse Productions Tour

Join us as we meet with the staff at Powderhouse Productions in Somerville to learn how they develop and create dazzlingly original, award-winning footage for television and emerging media. Powderhouse Productions boasts an extraordinarily talented group of creative media artists and professionals: writers, producers, directors, editors, actors, animators, technologists, coordinators and executives. They have produced such hit programs as: Build it Bigger and Extreme Engineering. Powderhouse programs are seen on many of the most well known cable networks in the world, such as Discovery, Animal Planet, History Channel and Science.
Where: 212 Elm Street, Somerville, MA www.powderhouse.net
When: Friday, May 7, 2010 Time: 12:00 - 1:00 pm
Admission: Free
RSVP: aspp.newengland@gmail.com
Evite: www.tinyurl.com/y6ok7pc

After the tour we are encouraging people to get together for an informal luncheon at Redbones Barbeque in Davis Square at 55 Chester Street, Somerville www.redbones.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Powderhouse Productions Tour
